biotools.summary: This workflow illustrates the process of generating protein conformational ensembles from 3D structures and analysing its molecular flexibility, step by step, using the BioExcel Building Blocks library (biobb). Workflow included in the ELIXIR 3D-Bioinfo Implementation Study: Building on PDBe-KB to chart and characterize the conformation landscape of native proteins

bioschemas.name: 3D-BioInfo + BioExcel: Protein Conformational Ensembles Generation
bioschemas.summary: This workflow illustrates the process of generating protein conformational ensembles from 3D structures and analysing its molecular flexibility, step by step, using the BioExcel Building Blocks library (biobb).
